instruction: How to reassign shift manager in one transport
output: Kindly follow the navigation to reassign the shift manager in One transport: 1. Login to https://onecognizant.cognizant.com 2. Launch One transport 3. Click on Shift cab 4. Select the new shift manager at the bottom

system: You are a helpful corporate AI assistant that helps employees with internal processes, applications, and workplace questions.
instruction: What is Reserve Instance flexibility
output: Whenever a VM is configured there is an option to choose between instance size flexibility or capacity priority. Instance size flexibility applies the reservation discount to other VMs in the same VM size group. Capacity priority designates data center capacity most important for your deployments. By default when the scope of the reservation is shared the instance size flexibility is on. The data Center capacity isnt prioritized for VM deployments. The reserved VMs can be optimised using Reserved instance flexibility.  Here is the example how you can take the benefit: You buy a reserved VM instance with the size Standard_DS4_v2 where the ratio or relative footprint compared to the other sizes in that series is 8.  Scenario 1: Run eight Standard_DS1_v2 sized VMs with a ratio of 1. Your reservation discount applies to all eight of those VMs.  Scenario 2: Run two Standard_DS2_v2 sized VMs with a ratio of 2 each. Also run a Standard_DS3_v2 sized VM with a ratio of 4. The total footprint is 2248. So your reservation discount applies to all three of those VMs.  Scenario 3: Run one Standard_DS5_v2 with a ratio of 16. Your reservation discount applies to half that VMs compute cost. More information :Click Here Instance size flexibility ratios
text:
<|begin_of_text|><|start_header_id|>system<|end_header_id|>

You are a helpful corporate AI assistant that helps employees with internal processes, applications, and workplace questions.<|eot_id|><|start_header_id|>user<|end_header_id|>

What is Reserve Instance flexibility<|eot_id|><|start_header_id|>assistant<|end_header_id|>

Whenever a VM is configured there is an option to choose between instance size flexibility or capacity priority. Instance size flexibility applies the reservation discount to other VMs in the same VM size group. Capacity priority designates data center capacity most important for your deployments. By default when the scope of the reservation is shared the instance size flexibility is on. The data Center capacity isnt prioritized for VM deployments. The reserved VMs can be optimised using Reserved instance flexibility.  Here is the example how you can take the benefit: You buy a reserved VM instance with the size Standard_DS4_v2 where the ratio or relative footprint compared to the other sizes in that series is 8.  Scenario 1: Run eight Standard_DS1_v2 sized VMs with a ratio of 1. Your reservation discount applies to all eight of those VMs.  Scenario 2: Run two Standard_DS2_v2 sized VMs with a ratio of 2 each. Also run a Standard_DS3_v2 sized VM with a ratio of 4. The total footprint is 2248. So your reservation discount applies to all three of those VMs.  Scenario 3: Run one Standard_DS5_v2 with a ratio of 16. Your reservation discount applies to half that VMs compute cost. More information :Click Here Instance size flexibility ratios<|eot_id|>

instruction: How do I tag an external hire
output: To flag an SO Service Order for external hiring follow these steps:  Once SO approved from TSC/OE standpoint Login to https://ctsccprod.service-now.com/ss portal. Search for Hiring Approval. Select Request Subtype as SO flagging. Enter all the requested information in portal which is mandatory for flagging. Once all the details filled Click on submit. Service Now Ticket will be generated for further processing and Ticket status can be viewed in My Tickets gtgt My Tickets in home page of Service now portal.  Explore additional resources about SO Simplification on Be.Cognizant. Explore additional resources about SO Simplification on Be.Cognizant.

system: You are a helpful corporate AI assistant that helps employees with internal processes, applications, and workplace questions.
instruction: How do I go about booking a meeting room with the OneCognizant desktop application
output: 1.Login to https://onecognizant.cognizant.com .   2. From Quick action select the Book Meeting Room option 3. Select the city location date time and enable the WebEx option if you want a WebEx bridge along with room booking. 4. Click on the book meeting room option and select the room from the popup  5. meeting room gets blocked and you will get a mail notification as well as notification in the My To-dos  tab in OneCognizant.

Select the city location date time and enable the WebEx option if you want a WebEx bridge along with room booking. 4. system: You are a helpful corporate AI assistant that helps employees with internal processes, applications, and workplace questions.
instruction: How should invoice costs be managed if they are split among different accounts and projects
output: Navigate to the ARIBA homepage and from the More option dropdown select Invoicing. Select the line item and choose Manage Accounting. Click on Add Split to split the cost with other projects and accounts. Click on the arrow to choose the split based on Percentage Amount or Quantity and enter the Percentage split between projects. Update the fields with the project details:      Location Code GL Business Unit Account Project Code Department   Click on Update to see the details. Click on Validate and Exit and hit the Submit option to process the invoice.
text:
<|begin_of_text|><|start_header_id|>system<|end_header_id|>

You are a helpful corporate AI assistant that helps employees with internal processes, applications, and workplace questions.<|eot_id|><|start_header_id|>user<|end_header_id|>

How should invoice costs be managed if they are split among different accounts and projects<|eot_id|><|start_header_id|>assistant<|end_header_id|>

Navigate to the ARIBA homepage and from the More option dropdown select Invoicing. Select the line item and choose Manage Accounting. Click on Add Split to split the cost with other projects and accounts. Click on the arrow to choose the split based on Percentage Amount or Quantity and enter the Percentage split between projects. Update the fields with the project details:      Location Code GL Business Unit Account Project Code Department   Click on Update to see the details. Click on Validate and Exit and hit the Submit option to process the invoice.<|eot_id|>

system: You are a helpful corporate AI assistant that helps employees with internal processes, applications, and workplace questions.
instruction: What is the process for withdrawing a case
output: You can withdraw your case by following the given steps if the case is not submitted to the Consulate for adjudication: 1. Please login to 1C gt GM360 gt select role as Associate. 2. Navigate to the Withdrawal screen by clicking on the Withdraw Case tile in the Landing page. 3. Select the Case you would like to withdraw and click on the Initiate Withdrawal option. 4. Enter the Withdrawal Reason and submit the withdrawal request.

system: You are a helpful corporate AI assistant that helps employees with internal processes, applications, and workplace questions.
instruction: Can you assist me with updating the income tax computation method
output: Log in to MyPay: Access the MyPay portal using your credentials. Navigate to Income Tax Computation Method: Go to MyPay -gt MyInvestments -gt Income Tax Computation Method. Select the Tax Regime: You will have the option to choose between the old tax regime with exemptions and the new tax regime without exemptions. Use the simulator available in the same section to compare the tax impact between the two regimes. Submit Your Choice: Once you have reviewed the results and decided on the regime that best fits you click the Submit button. Note that once submitted the regime selected is final and no further changes will be allowed in MyPay for the current financial year. Review Your Tax Computation Sheet: After submitting your choice you can view your actual tax liability for the current financial year through MyPay -gt MyStatements -gt Tax Computation.
text:

Select the Tax Regime: You will have the option to choose between the old tax regime with exemptions and the new tax regime without exemptions. Use the simulator available in the same section to compare the tax impact between the two regimes. Submit Your Choice: Once you have reviewed the results and decided on the regime that best fits you click the Submit button. Note that once submitted the regime selected is final and no further changes will be allowed in MyPay for the current financial year. Review Your Tax Computation Sheet: After submitting your choice you can view your actual tax liability for the current financial year through MyPay -gt MyStatements -gt Tax Computation.<|eot_id|>

system: You are a helpful corporate AI assistant that helps employees with internal processes, applications, and workplace questions.
instruction: How to fill Form I-9 compliance
output: Section 1: Employee Information - The employee must complete this section on or before their first day of employment. It includes personal information such as full name maiden name if applicable date of birth address and immigration status. Section 2: Employer Review and Verification - After the employee completes Section 1 the employer or an authorized representative must review the employees original documents in person to verify their identity and work authorization. This should be done within three business days of the employees start date. The employer or authorized representative must record the document information in Section 2 including document title issuing authority document number and expiration date if applicable. The employer or authorized representative must also sign and date Section 2.3 Section 3: Reverification and Rehires - This section is used for re-verifying an employees work authorization if their employment authorization document expires. If you encounter any issues or errors: Raise a ticket under Form I-9 Compliance application support for assistance. Provide any relevant screenshots or error messages for further support.
text:
<|begin_of_text|><|start_header_id|>system<|end_header_id|>

You are a helpful corporate AI assistant that helps employees with internal processes, applications, and workplace questions.<|eot_id|><|start_header_id|>user<|end_header_id|>

How to fill Form I-9 compliance<|eot_id|><|start_header_id|>assistant<|end_header_id|>

Section 1: Employee Information - The employee must complete this section on or before their first day of employment. It includes personal information such as full name maiden name if applicable date of birth address and immigration status. Section 2: Employer Review and Verification - After the employee completes Section 1 the employer or an authorized representative must review the employees original documents in person to verify their identity and work authorization. This should be done within three business days of the employees start date. The employer or authorized representative must record the document information in Section 2 including document title issuing authority document number and expiration date if applicable. The employer or authorized representative must also sign and date Section 2.3 Section 3: Reverification and Rehires - This section is used for re-verifying an employees work authorization if their employment authorization document expires. If you encounter any issues or errors: Raise a ticket under Form I-9 Compliance application support for assistance. Provide any relevant screenshots or error messages for further support.<|eot_id|>

system: You are a helpful corporate AI assistant that helps employees with internal processes, applications, and workplace questions.
instruction: How to create CWR SO
output: To create a CWR Contractor Workforce Request SO follow these steps: 1. In OneC open the Quick SOgtgt Raise new demand gtgt New demand. 2. Fill in the fields of Project amp Assignment and Location as we fill in for a regular Staffing SO  3. Select SO type as CWRgtgt Service defaulted to Custom service gtgt Select grade and choose a Non CCA demand role that is closer to your requirement For the list of NON CCA role codes and job codes Please refer to the worksheet embedded in the PM Handbook gtgt Select the job code with CW00 or CW20 available in drop down list based on grade selection amp add the Technical skill individually. 4. Fill in the reset of the details and click on Submit to raise the SO request. If you need any further assistance with creating a CWR SO please reach out to the SOSimplificationPM@cognizant.com. Explore additional resources about SO Simplification on Be.Cognizant.
text:

Select SO type as CWRgtgt Service defaulted to Custom service gtgt Select grade and choose a Non CCA demand role that is closer to your requirement For the list of NON CCA role codes and job codes Please refer to the worksheet embedded in the PM Handbook gtgt Select the job code with CW00 or CW20 available in drop down list based on grade selection amp add the Technical skill individually. 4. instruction: Does Price Builder have an integration to WinZone
output: Price Builder includes a real-time WinZone connection. We have an expected timeframe of 5-10 minutes from any new WinZone update. If the window is longer than 10 minutes and your data does not come into Price Builder we will need to verify your situation.   Please report this issue to GSD IT and they can assist you.

Notification message Reviewer access updated successfully. will appear on screen.

system: You are a helpful corporate AI assistant that helps employees with internal processes, applications, and workplace questions.
instruction: How can we ensure accuracy of tax calculation while raising a purchase request in ARIBA
output: To ensure the accuracy of tax calculation while raising a PR in ARIBA it is crucial to correctly input the Bill to Ship to and commodity code fields. The Ship to address determines the tax jurisdiction and rates while the Bill to address is used for invoicing and tax reporting. The commodity code classifies the goods or services affecting applicable tax rates. Incorrect entries in these fields can lead to tax violations resulting in financial penalties reputational damage and operational disruptions.
text:
<|begin_of_text|><|start_header_id|>system<|end_header_id|>

How can we ensure accuracy of tax calculation while raising a purchase request in ARIBA<|eot_id|><|start_header_id|>assistant<|end_header_id|>

To ensure the accuracy of tax calculation while raising a PR in ARIBA it is crucial to correctly input the Bill to Ship to and commodity code fields. The Ship to address determines the tax jurisdiction and rates while the Bill to address is used for invoicing and tax reporting. The commodity code classifies the goods or services affecting applicable tax rates. Incorrect entries in these fields can lead to tax violations resulting in financial penalties reputational damage and operational disruptions.<|eot_id|>

instruction: What are the steps involved in completing my Business Visa.
output: Following are the steps involved for an associate to complete Business Visa application. Once your Nomination is submitted and passed the required Eligibility Criteria. 1. Review and Certify your Profile. 2. Enter all the data and documents in Data and Document Gathering stage once your Visa Evaluation and Approvals are done. 3. Update your Stamping related details once your Review and Processing by the Global Mobility Team is completed.

system: You are a helpful corporate AI assistant that helps employees with internal processes, applications, and workplace questions.
instruction: How to edit dependent details
output: How to Update Dependent Information:  Navigate to PeopleSoft HCM at URL: https://compass.talent.cognizant.com On the Employee Self Service page click on the Personal Details tile. Within the Personal Details section click on Dependent Information. Find the dependent details you want to update. Navigate through tabs: Dependent Name Dependent Address and Dependent Profile. Modify the details in the appropriate panel. Once youre done click the Save button.
text:
<|begin_of_text|><|start_header_id|>system<|end_header_id|>

How to Update Dependent Information:  Navigate to PeopleSoft HCM at URL: https://compass.talent.cognizant.com On the Employee Self Service page click on the Personal Details tile. Within the Personal Details section click on Dependent Information. Find the dependent details you want to update. Navigate through tabs: Dependent Name Dependent Address and Dependent Profile. Modify the details in the appropriate panel. Once youre done click the Save button.<|eot_id|>
